content.text:
# Chauth Ka Barwara Panchayat Samiti

Chauth Ka Barwara Panchayat Samiti is one of the 7 Panchayat Samiti in the district of Sawai Madhopur in Rajasthan.
Panchayat Samiti Sadasy
